parameter.name: as-num
parameter.description: the identifier (ASN) of the AS this node belongs to

description.p: This command adds BGP support into the node identified by address. The node thus becomes a BGP router. The command also configures this router as a member of the domain identified by as-num.

Example:
# Add a new node to the topology
net add node 0.1.0.0
# Enable BGP support on this node and
# place this new router in AS1
bgp add router 1 0.1.0.0
